content.description:
On the side of the boulder in the upper corridor (with Jasper and Skillet Boulders forming the other sides of the corridor) look for the rounded face just to the left of the deep water groove (that is the line called "Car Ramrod"). 

 Stand start on the two low opposing pockets with the big iron foot rail low. Climb directly upward (water groove is considered off) past another pocket and the sloper dome above. Use the rectangle jug in the far back to top out.

Stand start at far right face (far right of Remain and Paddy) on the big iron plate jug. Climb directly up past many other plates and jugs. Top out on lower ledge below top capstone and walk around ledge to downclimb "Skillet" or jump down to pads.

To the right of the water groove (Ramrod) in the back corridor, look for the small arete. Close to the ground there is a pronounce iron band. 

 Sit start on the iron band at the arete and reach up to a left hand side-pull. Use the pocket out right, then go to the iron band at the top.
content.protection: pads (pad the close face behind you)

content.description: On the right side of the same iron feature as "Remain Calm" start in underclings and work right through thin iron and a big pocket. Reach the top of the iron feature and finish as per  "Remain Calm"

On the downhill-most face look on the left side of the massive iron plate. Stand start underclinging the iron and follow the curved iron left and upward. Get to the top of the feature and then work to the next iron feature. Mantle that iron and stand up to the high undercling. Above the undercling follow flat ledges toward the big groove and top out through it.

Between "Remain" and "Squad" look for the tornado shaped feature. Stand start anywhere that you can compress the tornado with hands on either side. Reach up to the dimple in the horizontal above, then climb to the deep iron horizontal jug rail. Begin trending up and right to link into the top of "Squad Car" and top out as per.

To the right of "Show Me" and "Drop Your Weapon" look below the iron bands for the good low flat sandstone shelf. Start matched and move up into the wonderful iron grooves. Follow more of the same above, then to higher iron bands up and left to top out.

To the right the small arete in the corridor (Show Me) sit start on the low iron shelf to the far right side of it.

 Move up and trend right toward the diagonal flat shelf and then the higher oval iron jug. Continue above through more iron goodness and top out.
Stand start low in the water groove (right on Ramrod, left of Show Me) and climb it to top out.
An enormous freestanding boulder with wonderful lines and features all around. Many lines on the front are super tall highballs, so please rappel down first to know what you're getting into.
